item.title: I need little help with my script[s] FIXED | Ty to SRL SCAR Tutorial
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

NO NEED HELP NO MORE ;D

[code]program Eudemon-Auto-Fightor;

var
ruut,ruut2,x,y:integer;

Procedure LoadBmps;
begin
ruut := BitmapFromString(27, 9, ‘z78DA737383016367106964804’ +
‘E920730CD21D534887A0324BD1017E2B2851240B90B0D709880CB’ +
‘64885F30494A5C88CB4CFC2EC46517A67B905308A92EC41F83E4B’ +
‘990F8D0A64416BF0B71A5F0C1E3425C7A07CA85C4E7E5814A87F8’ +
‘CB435C79D98868DF916726CC8500C1A77C94’);
end;

begin
loadbmps;
repeat
if(FindBitmap(Ruut,x,y))or(FindBitmap(Ruut2,x,y))then
Clickmouse(x,y,True);
wait(500);
until(false)
end.[/code]
There is image with txt GOLD. Well i am trieing to do bot what picks gold but i have 1 problem…how can i make transpency? Tere is writen GOLD in yellow and background is white but how can i make background invisible in SCAR?

[code]program Eudemon-Auto-Fightor;

var
ruut,ruut2,x,y:integer;

Procedure LoadBmps;
begin
ruut := BitmapFromString(50, 4, ‘z78DA73B230303630761’ +
‘A2547C95172941CF42400B986FA01’);
end;

begin
loadbmps;
repeat
if(FindBitmap(Ruut,x,y))or(FindBitmap(Ruut2,x,y))then
Clickmouse(x,y,True);
wait(500);
until(false)
end.[/code]

This is Autofighter! I want this to click monster but i have an problem This clicks HP bar whihitch isnt monster! lemme do the pic
